attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description:
This car is in immaculate condition. Presents with a full Service History and comfort  features such as:
-Manual blinds for rear door windows
-Exterior mirrors, heated with automatic anti-glare action, electrically folding with memory function
-Leather covered door arrest in the door trims.
-Driver information system.
-Bang and Olufsen Sound System 
-Design Package,Fine Nappa leather with front standard seats.
-Navigation system with Color.
-19" 10 spoke Alloy wheels.
-Memory function for Driver's seat.
-Audi music interface.
-Dual climate Control 
-Cruise Control 
-Xenon headlights
-Daytime running lights.
-Fog Lights.
-Headlight washer.
-Towing Hitch. 
-SD Card slot and Ipod connectivity.
-Parking Distance Control (front & rear)
-Preparation for mobile phone(Bluetooth) with center armrest and more. Finance available, trade ins welcome and option for extended warranty.
